comment: This is generated by ESQL's AbstractFunctionTestCase. Do not edit it. See ../README.md for how to regenerate it.
name: text_embedding
description: Converts a constant text into dense vector embeddings using a inference endpoint. The resulting vectors can be used for knn search, and other vector-based operations. Requires an inference endpoint configured with the `text_embedding` task type.  See [Inference API documentation] for how to create inference endpoints.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to generate embeddings from. Must be a non-null keyword constant.

params.name: inference_id
params.description: Identifier of an existing inference endpoint the that will generate the embeddings. The inference endpoint must have the `text_embedding` task type.
